name: Hxagon
description:
You are running out of time and every time you press space you add a few extra seconds but you also take a big risk.

(BEST EXPERIENCED IN FULL SCREEN)

HOW TO PLAY...

-on the bottom of the screen is a bar that shows you the time you have left.

-when you press space or tap on the screen the hexagon turns and you get a few  extra  seconds

- try to catch the ball with white platforms

- the number above the ball is your score (higher the difficulty the faster your score        rises)

-you can choose your difficulty when you die
